name: Kedgeree
recipeIngredient: 300g smoked haddock (picked over, bones removed and flesh cut into chunks),
sea salt and cracked black pepper,
good pinch cayenne and freshly ground nutmeg (optional)
recipeInstructions: Cook the onion gently in the butter for a few minutes, then add the rice.
Continue cooking gently and stirring, adding the curry powder and nutmeg. After a few minutes, add the milk, cream and 250ml water.
When the mixture begins to simmer, add the fish and continue simmering, stirring occasionally until the rice is cooked. Add water if the mixture becomes dry.
Season, add the parsley and stir. Add the eggs and garnish with cayenne and nutmeg if using. Serve topped with a knob of butter and wedges of lemon.
